events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it doesn't fit me at all. I would like to request a refund or exchange as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under refund based on the customer's request for money back due to sizing issues.
Support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the refund request for this customer case.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us about your order. I'm here to assist you with the refund or exchange process.
Could you please provide your order number and the size you originally ordered so I can check your purchase details?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and I ordered a medium size jacket, but it feels too tight on me.
Thank you for the details. We can process a refund for you or send out a larger size at no additional cost. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer to exchange it for a large size jacket. Thank you for the quick response and willingness to help.
Your exchange request has been processed. The larger size jacket will be shipped to you within 3-5 business days.
We are checking in to confirm you have received the replacement jacket and if everything is satisfactory with your new order.
Yes, I received the large jacket today and it fits perfectly. Thank you for your excellent support!
Closing this case as the issue has been resolved satisfactorily with the customer receiving the exchanged product.
